reviewText: I couldn't be more dissatisfied!!!  The GAME is not on the DVD.  Just background, commentary, and a FEW clips.
Got it for a die-hard Steelers fan that has most of the memorabilia and he watched it Christmas day

Huge Steeler Fan, knew a lot of the players from the 70' and 80's,  Gave it to our son for his Birthday and he was thrilled.
Plan to buy the series for our other son for Christmas.
